titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to limit the withholding of information subject to the Freedom of Information Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 5/13/1988--Introduced. Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to require the disclosure of exporters' license information pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act.
